item.title: Epic Games Store Users Technically Have 3 Freebies to Claim Right Now
item.description:
Epic Games Store users have until October 9 to claim the latest freebies across PC and mobile. Most Epic Games Store users are likely well aware that there are free games to claim on PC every Thursday at 10:00am CT. What some EGS users may not realize, though, is that there are also free mobile games to snag on a weekly basis as well.

Compared to the free PC game giveaways, the Epic Games Store free mobile games are a relatively new phenomenon. There are times when the EGS free mobile games overlap with the PC games, and so they get less attention, but there are also times when the mobile game offerings are completely unique. The latest Epic Games Store freebies lie somewhere in the middle.

On the PC front, there are two freebies for Epic Games Store users to claim right now. On one hand, Epic Games Store users can claim a Firestone Online Idle RPG bundle with $100 worth of content, and on the other, they can snag survival game Nightingale . Mobile users, meanwhile, also have the Firestone Online Idle RPG bundle to take advantage of, but instead of Nightingale , they can get puzzle game Doodle Devil: Dark Side . So someone using the Epic Games Store on PC and mobile can technically get three freebies this week instead of just two. These freebies will be available until Thursday, October 9 at 10:00am CT, at which point they will be replaced by the next batch of free offerings.

Epic Games Store Free Games Right Now

  • Doodle Devil: Dark Side (Mobile)
  • Firestone Online Idle RPG $100 Bundle (PC & Mobile)
    • Exclusive skin “The cheerful monk” for hero Benedictus Monk
    • 2 Avatars for your character profile
    • 10 Common chests, each containing at least 1 piece of Hero’s gear
    • 5 Uncommon chests containing at least 1 Uncommon gear
    • 10 Wooden chests with at least 1 piece of Hero’s jewels
    • 5 Iron chests with at least 1 Uncommon jewel
    • 360 Strange dust to train your Guardians or conduct Experiments
    • 50 scrolls to enhance your stats in battles
    • 35 Game tokens to test your luck at the Tavern
    • 5 Prestige tokens, to perform EPIC prestiges
    • 200 gems

  • Nightingale (PC)

One big difference between the Epic Games Store free mobile games and the free PC games is that users aren't clued in on what next week's mobile game offerings will bring to the table. On PC, we know that the Firestone Online Idle RPG bundle and Nightingale will be replaced by Gravity Circuit and the Rogue Journeyman bundle for Albion Online , which will be free from October 9 to October 16.

Looking further ahead, there are exciting times on the horizon for Epic Games Store users. The Epic Games Store free mystery game promotion will almost certainly return in December, and it will be interesting to see how it's handled on the mobile front. It's possible that the mystery games will only be on PC and the mobile giveaways will be business as usual, but that remains to be seen. EGS users should keep an eye out for more info.

item.title: PS5 is Absolutely on Fire Right Now
item.description:
Sony's PlayStation 5 has had an incredible 2025 full of exciting new game releases, with many more big games yet to come. Most of the highest-rated games of the year are readily available to play on the PlayStation 5, with a few key exceptions. For the most part, though, owning a PS5 means access to some of the best that the gaming industry has to offer.

The highest-rated new PS5 game released in 2025 so far is Shujinkou , an RPG that doubles as a tool to learn Japanese. The caveat is that Shujinkou has only 10 reviews counted so far, and so its score will likely fluctuate. If we discount that game, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has the highest score out of all the new PS5 games released in 2025 with an impressive 92 overall rating, followed by Hollow Knight: Silksong at 91, Split Fiction at 91, Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter at 90, and Death Stranding 2: On the Beach at 90.

Not only does the PS5 tend to get most multi-platform games, but it is also home to notable exclusives and console exclusive releases. The aforementioned Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is a PS5 exclusive, and the recently-released Ghost of Yotei , with its 87 overall score, is as well. Like Ghost of Yotei , the brilliant Sword of the Sea earned an overall 87 rating, and while it's available on PC, it's console exclusive to PS5.

Best PS5 Games 2025

  • Shujinkou - 94
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - 92
  • Hollow Knight: Silksong - 91
  • Split Fiction - 91
  • Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter - 90
  • Death Stranding 2: On the Beach - 90
  • Blue Prince - 89
  • Monster Hunter Wilds - 89
  • Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - 89
  • Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - 89
  • Pipistrello and the Cursed Yo-Yo - 88
  • The Talos Principle: Reawakened - 88
  • Monster Train 2 - 88
  • Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - 88
  • Ghost of Yotei - 87
  • Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector - 87
  • Sword of the Sea - 87
  • Silent Hill f - 87

This is just a selection of the fantastic games that have been released for the PS5 in 2025, but there's even more titles set to launch in the very near future. There are all kinds of exciting PS5 games dropping in October, with the likes of Battlefield 6 on October 10, Ninja Gaiden 4 on October 21, and The Outer Worlds 2 on October 29. In November, PS5 gamers can look forward to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 releasing on November 14, and while the big new releases tend to dry up near the end of the year, chances are good that The Game Awards on December 11 will be full of huge announcements for Sony's console.

2026 looks like it will keep the PS5's momentum going strong thanks to games like PS5 exclusive Saros releasing March 20 and Wolverine releasing in the fall. There's also Grand Theft Auto 6 , which is currently scheduled to launch on May 26 of next year. Clearly, the PS5 has hit its stride, and it will be exciting to see what the coming years bring for the platform.

item.title: Naughty Dog's New Game Intergalactic Gets Encouraging Update
item.description:
Naughty Dog fans have received an unexpected and exciting update regarding the studio's next game, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet , as it appears as though development on the title may be further along than initially thought. While Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet is likely still a few years away from release, Naughty Dog appears to be hiring localization employees for the title, which is something that usually occurs relatively far into the development process of a game.

For the past 20 years, Naughty Dog has worked solely on its two biggest IPs, The Last of Us and Uncharted . The two series are beloved by the majority of gamers, but many have been eager to see Naughty Dog put its skills toward something new. Thankfully, the community's prayers were answered when Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet was revealed at the Game Awards 2024 back in December. The brand-new, science fiction IP from Naughty Dog stars Tati Gabrielle as Jordan A. Mun, a bounty hunter who finds herself stranded on a remote planet while hunting down a crime syndicate known as the "Five Aces."

Naughty Dog Reportedly Begins Localization for Intergalactic

Naughty Dog didn't share a release date or even a launch window during the game's initial reveal, but it didn't take long for fans to pick up on some subtle references that suggested Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet may release in 2027. While that information has yet to be confirmed, it's looking increasingly likely, as Naughty Dog now appears to be hiring for localization employees, a process that often occurs in the backend of video game development. Now, that's not to say the game will be completed anytime soon, but it's a positive sign that the development process is likely going smoothly.

Even if it was ready in time, it's highly unlikely that fans will get to experience Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet in 2026. Not only did fellow PlayStation studio Insomniac Games recently reveal that the highly anticipated Marvel's Wolverine will release in Fall 2026, but Rockstar Games is also gearing up to launch Grand Theft Auto 6 in May of next year. PlayStation is unlikely to want two of its titles going head-to-head, and a release at the same time as what is expected to be one of the biggest games of all time would be a recipe for disaster.

Very little has been shared about Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet since its 2024 reveal, but director Neil Druckmann did recently call it "incredible." The developer explained how he's unable to talk much about Intergalactic , but did tease fans by stating that what was shown during the Game Awards was simply the "very, very, very tip of the iceberg." Druckmann then says that Intergalactic goes "pretty deep beyond" what was shown in the trailer. After striking gold with Uncharted and The Last of Us , Naughty Dog is likely eager to see if lightning will strike three times with Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet . Based on Druckmann's recent comments, the studio seems confident that that's the case.

Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet

Followed

Action
Adventure
Systems

Naughty Dog

item.title: Roblox: Peroxide Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Peroxide Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Peroxide
  • How to Get More Peroxide Codes
  • Peroxide Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Peroxide

There are plenty of great Roblox games that are inspired by manga and anime, but few, if any, are quite as good as Peroxide . As its name suggests, it's based on Tite Kubo's Bleach and offers players an incredibly enjoyable combat experience that Ichigo himself would be proud of. As in most other Roblox games, that experience can become even better with the help of Peroxide codes.

Players can redeem Peroxide codes to claim a ridiculous amount of free Product Essences, which they can then take to Kisuke in The City to get rerolls on every individual path. Product Essences can also be used to acquire cosmetic items, which is why fans of the game are always on the lookout for all of the latest Peroxide codes.

Updated October 4, 2025, by Tom Bowen: The latest Peroxide code is PLAYSTORMDELVE , which players can redeem to get 30 free Product Essences. After claiming their reward, they should take a moment or two to bookmark this page so that they can check back here from time to time, as we're constantly on the lookout for new codes for Peroxide and will update the list below whenever we find one.

How to Redeem Codes in Peroxide

As with similar Roblox games, the process of redeeming codes in Peroxide is relatively straightforward and does not require much knowledge or effort on the player's part. Even so, those having trouble can find step-by-step instructions on how to claim in-game rewards listed below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch Peroxide .
  • Then, if players are entering the game for the first time, they'll need to go through the tutorial.
  • Once the tutorial has been completed, in the upper left part of the screen, players should find and select the start button . It is located to the right of the chat button.
  • In the resulting menu, players should type or paste any of the active Peroxide codes listed above and then press Enter.

How to Get More Peroxide Codes

To get more Peroxide codes, players can subscribe to the developer's official Discord server, where they'll find news and updates about the game. However, the best solution is to bookmark this article, as it is updated every month.

Peroxide Tips and Tricks

Below, players will find some tips and tricks for Peroxide :

Shikai Unlocking

  • Reach level 15 as a Soul Reaper by completing quests on the board.
  • To defeat additional Hollows, visit Wake Up Mundo . It will cost 200 in-game currency.
  • Enhance stats by going to the gym near Kisuke or using agility boards.
  • After reaching level 15, meditate to unlock the Shikai.
  • Achieve B rank to use Shikai infinitely.

Resurrection Unlocking

  • Resurrection is automatically unlocked at level 15.

Use Crystals

  • Collect time relics to purchase crystals, which will enhance abilities.
  • Crystals can grant additional effects to attacks, such as setting enemies on fire.

Optimizing Stat Builds

  • Focus on combat stats rather than support stats.
  • Players need to choose stats based on their desired playstyle, whether it's a strength, vitality, or ability build.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Peroxide

Each game is special in its own way and offers an interesting gaming experience. That is why it is always fun for players to try something new. To that end, below is a list of the five best anime games like Peroxide :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Blox Fruits
  • Titan Warfare
  • Type Soul

item.title: Roblox: Blade Ball Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Blade Ball Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Blade Ball
  • How to Get More Blade Ball Codes
  • How to Play Blade Ball
  • The Best Roblox Mini-Games Like Blade Ball
  • About the Blade Ball Developers

Summary

  • Roblox players can redeem Blade Ball codes to receive free wheel spins and other great in-game rewards.
  • New Blade Ball codes are typically added on Saturdays when the developers update the game.
  • The Blade Ball codes contained in this guide are checked regularly to ensure that they remain up-to-date.

Blade Ball is a popular Roblox title with several innovative game modes. Its rules are simple. When players enter the playing field, the ball spawns and immediately begins to follow one of them around. In order to survive, this person has to hit the ball, making it fly even faster in the direction in which it was hit.

If players don't block the ball, they die, and the ball will appear again and target somebody else. The winner is the last person standing. As is the case in similar Roblox games, players are provided with several different options for diversifying gameplay. However, these generally need to be bought using coins, which are most easily obtained by redeeming Blade Ball codes.

Updated October 4, 2025, by Tom Bowen: Another Admin Abuse event is taking place this weekend. Sadly, however, there are once again no new Blade Ball codes. Despite the ongoing drought, we continue to search for new codes regularly and will update the table below whenever we find one. With that in mind, fans of the game should bookmark this page so that they can check back here regularly to avoid missing out on future codes for Blade Ball.

How to Redeem Codes in Blade Ball

The process of redeeming codes in Blade Ball is straightforward and similar to the ones found in other Roblox games. However, if players still find themselves facing problems or don't know how to do it, the following step-by-step instructions should help them to achieve their goal:

  • Launch Blade Ball .
  • Click the button labeled Extra in the top right corner of the screen.
  • Scroll down and press the Codes button.
  • Type or paste one of the working Blade Ball codes listed above into the field provided and then click the green checkmark.

How to Get More Blade Ball Codes

If players have redeemed all the codes and want more rewards, there are a few tips. In general, fans can visit the official Discord server of the developers. In addition to the working codes, users will find a lot of interesting content related to the game there, and will also be able to communicate with like-minded people. That said, it's much easier to just bookmark this article, as it is updated every month with all of the relevant codes for Blade Ball .

How to Play Blade Ball

Playing Blade Ball is easy and fun. To do this, simply wait for a new match and when all the players are on the field, the ball will be spawned. It will immediately start moving towards one of the gamers, which will begin glowing red. Then it is necessary to block the ball in time before it collides with the fan. If the collision occurs, the gamer loses. The player who remains alive wins.
